casebody.data:
LORAIN CTY. BAR ASSN.
v.
WEIR 2019-0150 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 1, 2019

DISCIPLINARY CASE

On relator's motion to show cause why respondent should not be punished for contempt for failure to perform as ordered. Respondent, Jeffrey Hile Weir II, ordered to show cause by filing a written response with the clerk of this court within ten days why he should not be held in contempt.
